summary: WHILE DRIVING  AT ANY SPEED AND WITH NO WARNING THE VEHICLE SHUT OFF,  AND CAUSED THE  CONSUMER TO PULL OFF THE ROAD.  THE DEALER WAS NOTIFIED.   *AK   ON ONE OCCASION, THE CONSUMER WAS IN THE VEHICLE AT A LIGHT WHEN SHE REALIZED THE VEHICLE WAS SITTING IN A PUDDLE OF GAS.  THE FUEL PROBLEMS STARTED ONE MONTH AFTER PURCHASE.  IT WAS DISCOVERED THE FUEL LINE HAD A HOLE IN IT AND WAS REPLACED.  (THE FUEL LINE WAS MADE OF RUBBER)   *SCC      *JB
